app stream and we deliver app only experience so some of the benefits I

optimize your application such that you can get the same instant on experience the third one is your applications are
secure and along with your data in Amazon apps and because these instances
that are running your applications are never exposed to the Internet and to these applicants tenses are actually
provision in your Amazon B PC so you can set up your custom security groups you can set up your policies and controls
access controls to kind of make sure your instances are secure a second the
data is also sitting in your Amazon V PC so you can access this data also through these instances in a very secure way the

firewalls so we streamed or HTTPS so you can just like how you access a web page
we work with your identity so if you we support Active Directory we support them
in joined instances so we gives you the single sign-on capabilities we support sam'l 2.0 so if you are using paying
octo chip ballot you can just do a single sign-on access similarly since
the instances are the main join if you are using network file shares for providing data access so you can
continue to use them or if you're using a CCM for example to deploy applications you can continue to use them so we can
work with your IT so our goal is always to make sure these instances are in your V PC so it continues to work as if they
were in your corporate resource in addition to that we always give you a built in identity a built in storage
back by s3 in case you don't actually have an existing infrastructure so this
is a way for you to kind of get started quickly the other big benefit of I was a ratcheting is you don't have to manage
anything this is for our customers who really want to take an application centric view where I don't want to
manage the desktop the instances are non-persistent we believe in bringing your applications data and the right
instance profile at runtime for your users and giving them the right best experience so we store the data in home
folders that are backed by s3 so we bring the data back we provision the applications at runtime
and then we kind of give you a runtime environment on the fly at the end of the session we terminate the instance so
there's nothing to manage we always bring up the latest and the greatest version of the software as well as the
operating system there and then this the last benefit is just like any other aw
service we are available in multiple regions so you can pick the closest region that's available to your workload

gets a fully dedicated VM for the duration of their application that they're using and they can choose the
right type of instance as well so you can start with for example a really small phrenology worker workload where
